description:
On those fire road suffer-fests and tricky technical climbs, the Loam Dropper has your back… well, your back-side. When it’s to drop-in and get sendy, this dropper tucks perfectly out of the way so you can flow with the trail. PNW created the Loam dropper to give riders a reliable, easily serviced dropper, that will leave you with some money for tires and post-ride beverages.

  • 25mm of tool free adjustment – in 5mm increments, making easier to find you and your bike’s perfect fit
  • Air cartridge design lets you fine-tune the pressure and return speed with your shock pump, it’s as simple as adding air via the Schrader valve under the seat clamp
  • Redesigned low-profile actuator means more of your seat tube can be used to hold your post, maximizing your frame’s capacity
  • Low-viscosity hydraulic fluid works well in cool temperatures
  • Compatible with all cable actuated dropper levers (lever and cable not included)
  • Minimum insertion length: 90mm
  • Full insertion length: 240mm
  • Seat collar to center of rails: 220mm
  • Total length: 440mm
name: PNW Components Loam Dropper Post 150mm Travel
